events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 1st, requesting to file a claim for damages.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the details describing the car collision provided by the customer.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to facilitate communication and guide the customer through the claims process.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the investigation will proceed promptly.
Request sent to the customer for photographs of the damaged vehicle, police report, and copy of the driverâ€™s license to proceed with investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed images of the vehicle damage and the official police report for review.
The claims investigation team began reviewing all submitted information, verifying details, and contacting witnesses related to the accident.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of fault and assessment of damages on the vehicle after thorough evaluation.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repairs and related expenses based on the damage assessment report.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and requested to proceed with claim approval soon.
The claim was formally approved after all validations, and the customer was notified of the approval status.
Payment for the repair costs was issued to the customer's bank account promptly to facilitate timely vehicle restoration.
The claim was officially closed following payment issuance and confirmation from the customer of receipt and agreement.
All documentation and case files related to this auto accident claim were archived in the company records for future reference.
